Define Documentation

#define DEFAULT_FILENAME   "../data/FurryLisa_rt.mid"
 

Generate checksum of a song a file using the SongPlayer API.

This can automatically detect and play either SMF or XMF files.

In order for song_player support to be compiled, The compiler flag SPMIDI_ME3000 must be defined as (1).

Author: Phil Burk, Robert Marsanyi Copyright 2005 Mobileer, PROPRIETARY and CONFIDENTIAL

#define FRAMES_PER_BUFFER   (SPMIDI_MAX_FRAMES_PER_BUFFER)
 

#define SAMPLE_RATE   (22050)
 

#define SAMPLES_PER_BUFFER   (SAMPLES_PER_FRAME * FRAMES_PER_BUFFER)
 

#define SAMPLES_PER_FRAME   (2)
 

Function Documentation

int main (  int  argc,
char **  argv
) 
 

Load a song, play it multiple times (tearing down the song player between iterations), check that all memory is returned.

Returns:
0 if test is successful, non-0 otherwise.
